descript.abstract: This dataset contains the Electoral Ward Boundaries which represent the divisions or districts used primarily for the election of representatives. These boundaries represent an attempt to divide the City’s population into equitable groups to ensure fair representation. These boundaries are approved by City Council in the City of Oshawa.
descript.purpose: To delineate and identify each of the five (5) Wards which will be utilized in the 2018 Municipal Election.

idinfo.useconst: Open Data License AgreementThis data is for reference use only. The City assumes no responsibility for the correctness of the data as it changes frequently and should not be used as a substitute for legal, real estate, survey or City of Oshawa staff advice.
idinfo.datacred: The Corporation of the City of Oshawa, Corporate Services Department, ITS Branch

enttyp.enttypd: Ward Boundaries for the 2018 Municipal Election

attr.attrdef: The number assigned to each polygon which represents each Ward.
Length of feature in internal units.
Area of feature in internal units squared.
